tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Events (
    event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    notification_sent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE notifications (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  message TEXT,
  notification_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE users (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,   role VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'user',   created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW() );
CREATE TABLE events (   event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,   event_date DATE NOT NULL,   event_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE triggers (   trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   trigger_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   trigger_description TEXT,   created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW() );
CREATE TABLE notifications (   notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   user_id INT,   message TEXT NOT NULL,   created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) );

CREATE TABLE AnomalyEvents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    severity INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
